alert.note: Alert for Milwaukee (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 6:39PM CST until February 22 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Occasional light freezing rain and sleet is expected to develop overnight and continue on Tuesday. Total ice accumulations of up to a quarter of an inch. Minor sleet accumulation possible. * WHERE...Milwaukee County. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible late tonight and Tuesday. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute on Tuesday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
